attributes.action: re-think the speed at which police officers are allowed to travel through built up areas when reacting to emergency calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people die as a result of police cars speeding through built up areas every year. The Independent Police Complaints Comission always rule that it is not the fault of the police officer as they are within their rights: their rights therefore need to be challenged in some other way
